name: Sample Node-Express Web Server Application
description: This application is a sample application.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio accountSid. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio authToken. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

TWILIO_WORKSPACE_SID.description: A Workspace is a container for your Tasks, Workers, TaskQueues. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/taskrouter/workspaces

TWILIO_CHAT_SERVICE_SID.description: Your Twilio Chat service instance identifier (SID). You can create a Chat service here: https://www.twilio.com/console/chat/services

TWILIO_API_KEY_SID.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/dev-tools/api-keys

TWILIO_API_KEY_SECRET.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API.
